website_summaries.verdict: A women's sport watch that's smaller than average size and available in several bright colors.
pros: Good range of useful, basic features
Customers appreciate that the numbers are easy to see in the clear display
Watch stands up to rough treatment
cons: Doesn't offer many advanced or unique timing features

customer_reviews.title: After 7 months on my 84YO mom, the band broke
customer_reviews.text: This is my 84 year old mom's 3rd Timex Marathon and her last. Each generation has lasted less and less time. They band does not take a licking, but the watch keeps on ticking. This one lasted 7 months before the band broke. The prior ones lasted for 2 years, then 1 year, now 7 months. The watch parts are great. But the band is trash. Of course the band is pretty specific to the model and a new band is more than a new watch. If my 84 year old mom can wear it out in 7 months - during covid quarantine, I can't imagine it would last an active person long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Updated review.
customer_reviews.text: Watch won’t start. Bought it for Nursing clinicals. Now I will go without a watch 😢 😢. Very frustrating and humiliating. Will send it back. As soon as I selected return, the seller sent me a good one. I received it, before I even sent the broken one back. 5 star for them!!! This one works. Looks great. Wonderful watch for nurses! Esp Cz of the seconds counting on the side. Can’t set the date though, but I will figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Hellen

customer_reviews.title: After two years, band is stained
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I got it in bright pink two years ago and all functions are still good. But the wristband is hard to clean and now it permanently looks dirty. I’ve bleached it, scrubbed it, and tried various cleaners, but the band has darkened and seems stained now. It looks bad, so I’ve moved on to another watch.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Rodriguez-Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for my pre-teen!
customer_reviews.text: The color of the band is a bit closer to red/coral than bright pink as pictured, which was a bit of a surprise to my 12-year-old daughter, who purchased this watch for herself and who is a big fan of pink. Despite that, she says it "looks very cool" and she is pleased with its appearance overall. She had a bit of a difficult time setting the minutes (not very intuitive to figure out) but we Googled a manual and she was able to figure it out. Size is good for her small wrist. She likes the silicon band. Displays everything she needs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Cute, value sport watch
customer_reviews.text: What a great little sport watch! Nothing fancy here but it is durable, water resistant and cute. I wear it to work around the yard, at the beach and around the pool. I have a very small wrist and I can wear it on the 2nd and 3rd hole. Many sport watches are too big for me but this one fits great and is comfortable! Display is clear in daylight and the indiglo night light is bright enough without being offensively so. Setting the time and date took me a few minutes and a google search but wasn't complicated. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Frogzilla80

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. I'm very happy with the wristband, and the options for the alarm and stopwatch work as expected. The band could easily fit any size wrist, from children to adults. It has options for other time zones, or for 12/24 hour time, which can be a slight hassle to sort out at first, but eventually you'll get the settings right. The orange rubber has discolored over time and has started to turn black, but it's not unsightly or anything and the watch seems like it can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: RaineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: perfect small watch for around the farm. I train horses and am hard on my watches and this one is standing up to it all. A little hard to figure out how to set, I wish it did come with its own instructions, but thats all I can find to complain about. So I'm happy! I love the more petite size, my last watch that was tough enough was huge and sometimes interfered with movements while riding. this one sits nicely on my wrist and I can forget its even there.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S D

customer_reviews.title: Favorite watch!
customer_reviews.text: I had a watch that looked almost exactly like this and I loved it, so I was really sad when I lost it. However, this one is even better the one I had before! Excellent quality for the price, matches with virtually every causal outfit I have, adjusts perfectly to my wrist, and does not feel big or blocky. It does not come with instructions on how to set it, but it's pretty easy to figure out. Also some people in the reviews here were nice enough to provide pictures of the instructions specifically for this watch, so don't let the fact that many others are complaining about a lack of instructions deter you from getting a very good watch!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: defective item received
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, we received the used/returned watch which was defective (setting time function was not working) and the instruction was missing too. We re-ordered the same item hoping we will get the new watch next time. When we returned the item, we noted that the watch is defective so that Amazon will not try to sell this one again. Very disappointed to received use/broken item.
customer_reviews.author: Wakawaka7

customer_reviews.title: Missing instructions
customer_reviews.text: Just got watch so cannot evaluate its worthiness over the long haul, but writing review because the watch arrived with no instructions on how to set it. I tried to use logic but couldn't get everything set up properly. I found instructions on the Timex website and finished the set up (which had a surprisingly tricky twist I never would have guessed by applying logic), but they should have been included with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hunt

customer_reviews.title: cheap and durable
customer_reviews.text: Not huge like all the other cheap casios or timex watches available. stock band is fairly big. I have already scratched the face but still easily readable. Pros: cheap durable tells time fun color good size cons: scratches easily band ages and darkens orange bezel around seconds display reduces visibility
customer_reviews.author: Iwanttorockandrollallnightandpartyeveryday

customer_reviews.title: Great little watch for the price. Orange band is prone to staining.
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my son for his 6th birthday - fits him perfectly. He wears it daily and has been rough on it, so it has a few scratches but keeps on ticking. It hasn't seen the pool yet, but that's coming up soon! My only complaint is that the band became stained quickly. It's got a black stain around the edges from dirt and it won't clean off. It might not see the same abuse from an adult.
customer_reviews.author: PlaysWellWithOthers

customer_reviews.title: 6 months exactly: Band broke (not replaceable)
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, but the band is terrible. First the watchband got discolored (got grubby and I couldn’t get it clean) and then the band broke. As far as I can tell, Timex does not sell replacement bands for the Marathon Women’s, not even on their website. Since the band is non-standard, you want really use a NATO strap, either. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Tom Coleman, Pawsitivity

customer_reviews.title: I had the previous model of this, the 1440 ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous model of this, the 1440 sport, but the watch band broke after a couple years of constant wear. This watch is a gorgeous color and the functionality is okay (the same as the 1440), but the free loop would not stay on the watch band end so it was constantly getting caught on things. My daughter ended up keeping it, she has smaller wrists and doesn't seem to have this problem. I got the ironman triathlon instead and greatly prefer the features of that watch to this one.
customer_reviews.author: NurseJ

customer_reviews.title: Thiswatch is good
customer_reviews.text: This watch is good! It has been least one year. It is still holding up good. I would buy another when the I have is gone. When you set the date, be careful with the year. I press the button a bit fast & I'm few years ahead. The day of the week is wrong. Wish there was a reset button! I don't mind it much. Least the time & the date of the day is right. I watched a youtube video in order to set it. It wasn't that complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Ayaliah

customer_reviews.title: This one not so good....
customer_reviews.text: This is my second timex Marathon watch and my first one is still going after 5 years but I am a Tech in an ER and I use military time for labeling labs so I am constantly pushing the button to switch it over and it's finally worn out. I ordered a new one and this one is filling up with condensation. I'm super bummed and will exchange it for another one but all in all this is an outstanding watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Decent watch but the strap is broken in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: The watch is fine. What you'd expect. But the strap is garbage. Even if there is a warranty, at this price I won't bother checking because they're run me through the headache of shipping it there and back (the cost of the watch), plus all the time and effort. I would definitely recommend NOT buying this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ephie Risho

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch now for over 3years!!! (You purchased this item on May 12, 2016) I wear it daily to work (active job) & the gym and occasionally forget I'm wearing it when I take a shower. I'm still on the original battery. The watch itself is big enough to use & see the numbers on the screen but small enough to not get in the way of whatever the activity.
customer_reviews.author: G-Family

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with it. That's what really mattered. The features are good, and it's fairly easy to deal with, but some features are not as clear as I wish (e.g. turning off a chime, etc... always takes some playing around because it's not directly intuitive). All in all, it was a good value for us.
customer_reviews.author: MarkR

customer_reviews.title: Great functions, cheap band
customer_reviews.text: Watch functions well, but the band broke in under 6 months. Bought this in April for my preteen son, and the band broke where he had it connected. Definitely disappointed, but he wants the same one again as he loves how it functions. At least it's inexpensive, but still a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: often frazzled

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. I wanted a watch to easily check the time that had an alarm & timer. This watch fits the bill. It only has one alarm but does have the dual time zones & light on the face. Everything I need. Setup was easy, just like the other Timex's I've had. Instructions are apparently online if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G

customer_reviews.title: Defective and returned
customer_reviews.text: The watch was defective and was returned. The indigo didn't work right out if the box and the time was constantly changing without pushing the buttons. My son LOVES the color orange and was devastated that we had to send it back. We ordered a different brand and the new watch is great.
customer_reviews.author: LJB

customer_reviews.title: Bright pink and not chunky!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch because it's bright pink and does not have a huge face like many women's watches. The buttons are easy to press, and Timex watches usually last a long time. The only disappointing aspect is that the light underneath "PM" is difficult to see. This is not typically a problem because you usually don't check whether it is morning or night, but it does pose a problem when setting the watch because it is important when the date rolls over to the next day. Luckily, the "PM" light is well-illuminated with the indiglo feature!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good I love the color and basic design it takes a little bit of time to get to know the buttons etc but it's not rocket science. The buttons are a bit stiff I'm not sure if that is because it's new or its just like that but for the price features and looks I can get past that. I have a pretty small wrist and with all the size adjustment it can fit just about any sized wrist! Overall good watch and I would definitely buy it again👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Denny

customer_reviews.title: I love it but the face of the watch DOES scratch pretty easy so be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is an AWESOME watch. The Indiglo light is pretty bright and the watch is really easy to read and feels nice on. I do have a hard time remembering how to set it and setting it pretty much REQUIRES reading the instructions so don't throw those out like I did! The only slight complaint I have - and the reason I only gave 4 stars is that the face of the watch seems to scratch really easy which isn't cool.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Very simple digital watch. Has all the basic functions ...
customer_reviews.text: Very simple digital watch. Has all the basic functions but my main complaint is it doesn't come with directions, and though it says to find them online, they are very hard to find and I have yet to find the correct ones. Haven't had any problems with waterproofing, and I wash my hands frequently. Tried for about a half hour to change to military time but couldn't figure it out. One day I happened to accidentally hit a combination of buttons and lo and behold it is now in 24 hour time. I just wouldn't know how to get it back to regular!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great watch with one glitch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is marvelous. Sturdy, two time zones, stopwatch, alarm, indeglow for night viewing and Timex reiliability, etc. Very comfortable. THERE IS A PROBLEM THOUGH: The Day/Date is correct for the date but the day of the week is from 2018 not 2017. It's of small importance to me but you might consider this if you need the day to be correct. I'm not sure what days it will display next year.
customer_reviews.author: prof. DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive watch
customer_reviews.text: Used at Disney World & Disney Cruise. I never wear a watch & just use my phone to check the time. This awesome little watch allowed me to keep my phone in my backpack and focus on everything around but still check the time on this simplistic watch. No distractions from having to see the time on my cell phone & respond to unwanted calls, texts, etc. Stay in-the-moment with a watch! I looked online to find set up instructions
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Orange Marathon Timex
customer_reviews.text: The watch broke on the first day. Got a replacement (thank you Amazon) but it is fixed on military time. I have read the manual and searched the internet - nope. I usually love Timex, but if I could go back in time I would not by this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rell

customer_reviews.title: Xmas gift now.
customer_reviews.text: Somehow did not notice it was a women’s watch. First time in my life I have found a band to small for my wrist. My 7 year old great niece will be getting a pretty cool Christmas gift this year. She is very excited to receive a big girl watch.
customer_reviews.author: chris gonterman

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Was a tad difficult to get the time set as it did not come with instructions on how to set the watch and what the functions were. Over all, this watch is lightweight, convenient and I wear it all day (shower also).
customer_reviews.author: C.A.Clark

customer_reviews.title: 10.99 watch is awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: I love the color (Bright Orange). It is a very comfortable watch. The only problem is there were no instructions. Had to go to internet. Timex website a bit daunting. Couldn't believe I got this watch for less then $11. Great deal. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Davis

customer_reviews.title: Durable love it
customer_reviews.text: I wear it all the time. Only time I take it if is to shower or go in the water. I've had it over a year. Still works great is pretty durable I regularly ssmack my wrist into the wall in the mornings lol. It's all still in one peice. I have no clue how to clean I don't really care that much so my white one is dingy now. But it works great and when it was still white looked classy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The buckle came apart once so far, but it was easy enough to put back together. I'm a long-time Timex fan. My 11yo daughter wears it & she's pretty rough on it. The band parts get very dirty, & I haven't bothered but I suspect it's going to be easy enough to clean w a little 409. It was a bit of a pain to set but nothing I couldn't handle. My daughter & I are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: LovnLif79

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for Old Timex Watch and is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I swim every day for an hour and can know the time anytime! It is also chic and easy to operate. My package did not contain directions on setting the watch. However, that can be found by going to the Timex website and looking for this particular watch. It is easy to set and does not have many settings that I did not need.
customer_reviews.author: KKP

customer_reviews.title: The band is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I'm a disabled woman who stays mostly inside. I bought this in September and by December, the watch band was black. I've tried everything to clean it and nothing will. You also can't just get a new band. Spend a little more money and get something that will look good longer than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Spainhour

customer_reviews.title: Surprised Timex would put their name on this product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these watches, one for each daughter, one is doing good and the other is broken, which is why it is getting two and not one star. The watch claims to be water resistant to 50 meters, however use in a backyard pool was too much for one of these watches. She has been wearing the watch for less than two months with no visible damage or abuse and after a visit to the pool, the watch had visible moisture inside and then stopped working properly. I was very shocked given this is a Timex and also shocked when I realized this product only has a 30-day warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wartick

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this watch
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this watch! He has had one just like this since was 9 or so, and he's now 12. He is able to use the buttons himself and set the watch with the settings he desires. For a young man that likes to get out and play, it's held up very well. The bands do get very dirty. Every time we buy a new one it amazes me just how gross looking the 'old' watch band is. We've never tried to actually scrub it clean, though, so I don't know how well it would clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the indiglo, so I can check the time when i wake up at night. Mine came without a user guide and it took quite a while to find it on the internet so i could set the right time. [...] Word of caution: mine came with a preset alarm which of course went off at 2AM before i figured the watch out. So download the user guide and set everything the way you want it before using the watch! Other than that seems decent enough. Certainly suits my purpose and seems like a solid watch. If my kids wore watches I would consider this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was super confusing and not intuitive
customer_reviews.text: I had three other people try to program this watch and get it to work, but they couldn't. It was super confusing and not intuitive. Trying to set the time, it would only let you go up or down by 30 minute increments. It also just didn't seem to want to work, and we had to push the buttons really hard to get it to register. It's a digital watch, not a Rubix cube.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for long term use
customer_reviews.text: Timex is a great brand, but these watches don't hold up. We've purchased four in the last 2 years. They are not as water resistant as advertised, ok for shower, not swimming. Band is flimsy and will crack.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Weishaar

customer_reviews.title: Timex watches for years. This new one:  not so sure.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Time and date display ok, however, the "mode" print/description for the buttons - have a magnifying glass handy. No instructions with package. Directed to online at Timex. Initial trouble downloading the instructions; then couldn't find a print size big enough to read the directions on my computer screen. Gave up in frustration. Tried again next morning. FINALLY able to get at least the time and date set. Will save the alarm and time zone settings for another day. Long term? unknown
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Cannot reset time
customer_reviews.text: I loved this watch when I received it and right up until it was time to reset to standard time. I have followed the directions at least a dozen times, several other people have also tried to no avail. We are all unable to reset the time. I wish I had known this before the Oct. 1 return date. What do I do next?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tell time
customer_reviews.text: Dictated directly from my 7 year old: It can light up in the dark. It is easy to tell time. This watch is very good to use. It does what it is supposed to do. It is easy to put on, the wristband isn't too tight, and I love to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: tbmb

customer_reviews.title: Longtime favorite
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these watches for many years. I even wore one on a several-day kayaking trip, and it survived a tipover event in churning whitewater. For the price, they can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Deluxa

customer_reviews.title: Survived a year on a roof
customer_reviews.text: I guess sometimes they do make things like they used to. Over a year ago my daughter's friends accidentally tossed the watch on the roof of the school building. Understandably, we gave it up for lost. Today we got an email from the school that her watch had been found, and amazingly enough, was still working. It spent a whole year on the school roof in the snow and rain, and only ended up slightly discolored, and it only lost about six minutes. Not bad for a $14 watch.￼￼
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Schwarzmer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps switching to military time and I cannot figure out how to change it back. Once I stumbled upon the switch back, but I don't know how. It did not come with any directions.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the quality. Stopped working after a few months. I tried a new battery, did the reset multiple times, nothing worked. I used to really like Timex and still have one that is over 20 years old and still working. Unfortunately, their product line quality just isn't that good anymore. This is the second that has done this. Its too bad, the form factor is really nice and it functionally worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jumesan

customer_reviews.title: Small face and works!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter who has a small wrist. She loves the color and loves that it is not bulky on her wrist! Easy to set and change the time without instructions is a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Biased Perspective

customer_reviews.title: NOT Reccomended...
customer_reviews.text: Love Timex Love color Light is too dim. Can not tell when am or pm, no dot or slash on screen to show you. I would not recommend unless changes are made. Would NOT buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle p.

customer_reviews.title: Can't pair the right numerical date to the day of the week.  Otherwise okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's an older watch, which means I can pair it to match the appropriate day of the week in 2017. If I set it for the right day (ex: jan 3) it will set for a different day of the week, and the setting can't be corrected. Otherwise it's okay. Looks just like the picture. If I didn't need a watch immediately for work I'dve returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Meri

customer_reviews.title: I have had several just like it, so was very pleased when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: I have had several just like it, so was very pleased when it arrived. However, this time there was no set of instructions for setting the time and using its functions. There was an extended warranty sheet, but no how to sheet. I have managed to lose the last set of instructions I had. I am pretty bad at guessing which buttons to push, so have not attempted to set the time myself. Frustration is happening here.
customer_reviews.author: brelyea

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this watch for 19 days. The light went out on day 1. It lit up twice then never came back on. Today i looked down and the band is starting to break. I am very disappointed in Timex. Their quality is not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Mere

customer_reviews.title: Nice kids watch: Perfect look/fit + great cost
customer_reviews.text: Timex makes great watches and my daughter loves this one. This is actually her second one after 3 continuous years of use the older one's band broke. Bands were nearly the same cost as a whole new one so I elected for a new watch. Waterproof, tough, easy to use. Great kids watch!
customer_reviews.author: Dan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: The screen is smaller than I expected, but at $9.99, I am not complaining. The manual in the box doesn't have much info but luckily instructions are easily found online. And the kids love the bright orange color!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Great size and style
customer_reviews.text: Cute, stylish watch for a good price. Love the white color. Described as "unisex" but is best suited as a girls/ladies' watch because of the small face. I have a narrow wrist and here's what it looks like
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my 10 yr old daughters birthday. She ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 10 yr old daughters birthday. She LOVES it. It has a fairly small diameter so it fits her wrist fairly well. If you are looking for an inexpensive sport watch smaller in size than this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Gr8jpn

customer_reviews.title: This is a good watch. This is actually the second one I've ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good watch. This is actually the second one I've bought. The first I had for about 4 years and it still works I just banged it up a bit from constant wear at work so it was time for a new one. I looked at a few others before buying my second Marathon but decided to stick with this since I've had no problems and I like all the features, especially stopwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy unless you have patience
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch, but no instructions on how to set watch. Not worth my time to figure it out either. I should have send back.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Schram

customer_reviews.title: This watch is trash.
customer_reviews.text: Received in July 2019. My kid took it out of the box a couple of weeks ago (October 2019). He said it was still too big for him so he left it on his desk. A few days ago he says it's not working anymore. Thought it was the battery. Took it to a watch shop to get the battery replaced but they said it's fully charged and the watch itself is faulty. We know it's a cheap watch, but at the very least it should work, right? We didn't pay $11 for trash.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Pink one more suited for a child
customer_reviews.text: Cons: I don't know if it is because it is pink but it looks like a watch for a child not an adult. Pros:The watch works great and I love the features. Will re gift to someone else who will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: ktben27

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, just as shown, vibrant coloring, go online to youtube and look up this model to figure out how to program. Came with no instructiions.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the middle schooler!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter in middle school and she loves it! It's easy to use. I should say the directions are easy to follow. So once you know what everything does you're golden! It stands up to her wear and tear. The one she had before this was the one they made before this one and it lasted for 3 years of everyday wear! The band finally broke on that one. But this one has the same durability it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa A

customer_reviews.title: Great for healthcare workers!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through numerous watches due to the fact that water gets underneath the glass and ruins the watch. I have had this watch for over a month now and I have had no water issues! As a nurse it is working perfectly! It illuminates when needed and it can be set to military or standard time. I would recommend it to any healthcare workers looking for a reliable and waterproof watch!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren St. Onge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our daughters
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for watches for our daughters, ages 8 and 11 for Christmas. They are past the kid-looking watches but not quite ready for a big adult watch. This watch is the perfect size for them and it's also reasonably priced. They like the features of the alarm and the light so they can see the time at night. I also like that they are water-resistant in case they forget to take them off in the shower or get them wet washing their hands.
customer_reviews.author: MomToThreeGirls

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Very basic, single time with 12or24,hr, single alarm, single stopwatch, no lap function, waterproof, lights up when pressed
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Simple watch for 10yr old
customer_reviews.text: My son broke his last watch. This exactly fit the bill for a replacement - not too expensive, simple features, water resistant, simple frills.
customer_reviews.author: E. Porres

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: This is a good watch. It might sound funny because there are already many to choose from, but I wish it were offered in even more color combinations :) It's affordable, right size, nice quality, digital military time... It's good for work or play for me I like it a lot and own several colors of this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Pawprince

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Short band
customer_reviews.text: Great watch but band is only for very small wrist. Great watch with poor band. Good quality, just not much adjustability.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Humor

customer_reviews.title: I like the watch but it has no timer function
customer_reviews.text: Beware....I like the watch but it has no timer function. I should have noticed this when I ordered it but didn't. This is a function I used ALL the time on my previous Timex....for cooking, for work, for laundry, etc.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Small watch band
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my old Timex which would not change to daylight savings time. The watch arrived without instructions to set the tone and I had to download them from the Timex site. The watch and is almost too short for my wrist and is very stiff.
customer_reviews.author: rightimage

customer_reviews.title: We love thewatch
customer_reviews.text: We love the watch, but were really surprised that it didn't come with a manual. You will not figure it out without one either. We had to write to Timex to get a copy of the manual and then we were good. But I don't think the customer should have to track it down themselves. I wonder if other people's came with a manual and ours was just a fluke?
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch for Kayaking
customer_reviews.text: ordered this watch to use while kayaking... and it's exactly what I needed. I normally do not wear a watch, but wanted / needed something to track time while kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Ant Mary

customer_reviews.title: A well-rounded watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little Timex. Shows everything you need on the screen, day, date, time and seconds! Also has alarm! Indigo light. Good little watch!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality watch
customer_reviews.text: Qualy made and battery was new when I received it. These watches are durable and a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lickn' and keeps on tickn'-SERIOUSLY!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third watch like this I have purchased! I love them! I washed it, and dried one of them the other day, and it still works!
customer_reviews.author: Camiemom

customer_reviews.title: NOT MID SIZED!
customer_reviews.text: Descent looking but really tiny. No where near mid-sized. I have had these watches for years and they have really started skimping on size. It is good for a very tiny woman or a child. I would never wear it in public they quality has gone down from past years.
customer_reviews.author: Krazybabe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a girl
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece who is 11. She is pretty active like I am so I bought her a watch like my Ironman. She loves it and it fit well.
customer_reviews.author: a2cool

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Only minor negative is that it was worn for less than a month and the strap holder already fell off.
customer_reviews.author: AsiaUser

customer_reviews.title: Great little watch !
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Timex watches... my favorite is the Expedition. But I saw this Marathon on Amazon for less than $11.00 in my favorite color (orange). It is very attractive and easy to read. Easy to set. Nice that it is water resistant so I don't have to take it off in the shower or swimming. This watch only has one alarm setting, but for the price, it is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID R.

customer_reviews.title: Athletics
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so useful, especially since during my softball period at school I need to know what time it is during the workouts! It really doesn’t do much but I don’t need a high tech watch just to look at the time!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Upper elementary super watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4th grader and she loves it. Easy to use, directions are online but most of these athletic watches work the same so its not hard to figure out. Its durable and comfortable, perfect for tumbling around the playground. She loves the timer and stopwatch features.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The strap lasted exactly 4 months before completely breaking off of the watch. The little "axle" broke and the strap became detached. Timex warranty policy requires the owner to pay to ship the watch to them, plus $7 to cover the cost of repair and 'shipping' (which costs no more than $4), which means I'm paying around $11 to repair a $15 watch. So it's NOT a 'free repair' within a year. Buyer beware - the Timex 'warranty' means you pay 75% of a new watch cost to get your used one back!
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Battery is Dead
customer_reviews.text: Very upset received the watch today and the battery is dead are you kidding me?? The warranty does not cover the battery so now I need to replace a battery would have saved the headache and went to the store versus buying on line. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Shanette

customer_reviews.title: I could not make the watch operate!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived and stared at me with a challenge: are you up to getting me going? I opened the "instructions." They told me -- in 20 languages -- to go on line for advice. I did this and found the online advice useless and confusing. I am going to give the watch (and the instructions) to a granddaughter who hopefuly will be able to make it all work.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Canning

customer_reviews.title: It was great except for 2 things
customer_reviews.text: I wore this watch for just about 3 months then the Indiglo light failed! This is like my 8th Timex and it is the first time I had the indiglo light stop working in less than a year. The strap has also discoloured and is yellowish brown now. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad in water.  But great watch if you don't use it in water.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price for sure. But we've lost two of them to water damage just from playing in the pool. They just aren't good in water at all. We stepped up from this "Marathon" version to the Timex "IRONMAN" (women's version) and those have been way more durable. They do cost more of course. But in this situation, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: CCCCW

customer_reviews.title: but then it was fine. I love it
customer_reviews.text: This watch is really cute! I have a tiny wrist and it fits really, really well. The settings took me a few minutes to figure out, but then it was fine. I love it. I'm considering getting another one in a different color! It's keeping time perfectly! Great little watch!
customer_reviews.author: Saved by Grace

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got two for my 8 year old boy and girl, they love it! It fit my small wrist too.
customer_reviews.author: Drama Mama

customer_reviews.title: Dependable With Lots of Features for the Price
customer_reviews.text: A little higher & larger than I expected, having had some previous Timex sports watches, but not too clunky or heavy. Bright, easy to read face with a lot of useful features. I got it for keeping track of time when I'm out hiking or working in the garden and it's perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Book Collector

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my little girl and she loves it!!! Good little started watch to help kids know the time.
customer_reviews.author: SSS

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Timex is always good except for there Bands they wear out pretty fast .This one has no light..
customer_reviews.author: Janice Decker

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a Good Watch for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an inexpensive watch that lit up at night so I can see the time n bed. This is exactly what I hoped for. It has other functions but I am only interested in this one. I have had it for a week and so far it is working well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Price

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Used for less than a week before the watch stopped working- time was stuck at a single number, and the buttons no longer responded. Sent it back. I've used Timex watches for the last three decades, and even with daily hard use they have always lasted at least 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: josie m.

customer_reviews.title: Need instructions on setting watch .
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive instructions on how to set my watch. Please send to me as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Great workout watch
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy watch. Love to wear it when I work out. Wish it was easier to set. If setting wasn't so hard, I'd rate it a 5. The watch does everything and I can wear it when I swim.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Regan

customer_reviews.title: The watch is fine. However
customer_reviews.text: The watch is fine. However, there were no instructions at all on how to set it. Timex has a good reputation so I assume it will work properly and last a long time. I got it 2 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is super cute and the color is true to what is ...
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute and the color is true to what is advertised, but I cannot read it. There is too much type in too small an area. I cannot read it standing still and cannot imagine trying to read it while running.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: My favorite watch. I was upset when my last one broke.
customer_reviews.author: rachel huckins

customer_reviews.title: Watch does not have timer feature
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, waterproof, looks pretty decent and lasts a long time (had my past one for 5 years before the wrist strap broke). However, please be warned, this watch does not have a timer! I'm not sure why they took out this feature but I was extremely disappointed to not have a basic feature of a sports watch. I will be buying a new watch and staying away from this one for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

product_meta.title: Marathon by Timex Mid-Size Watch
product_meta.description:
If you’re looking for a simple digital sports watch, you’ve found it. A daily alarm, two time zone settings, 24 hour stopwatch, and Indiglo night-light. Plus it’s water resistant to 50 meters.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :5 x 3 x 3 inches; 1.02 Ounces
 * Item model number :T5K364
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :July 27, 2009
 * Manufacturer :Timex Corporation
 * ASIN :B00284C9S2

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #10,670 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #7 inWomen's Outdoor Recreation Sport Watches 
    *  #11 inMen's Outdoor Recreation Sport Watches 
    *  #9 inWomen's Sport Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.1 out of 5 stars931 ratings If you’re looking for a simple digital sports watch, you’ve found it. A daily alarm, two time zone settings, 24 hour stopwatch, and Indiglo night-light. Plus it’s water resistant to 50 meters.
feature_bullets: Daily Alarm and Two Time Zones
Durable and Lightweight Resin Case and Strap with Buckle Closure
Water resistant to 50 m (165 ft): In general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling
